[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_slider module_class=”et_fullscreen_slider” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide button_link=”/preinstalled” use_bg_overlay=”off” use_text_overlay=”off” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ background_color=”#009de0″ background_image=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/IMG_1310-2.jpg” button_on_hover=”on” inline_fonts=”ABeeZee”]

From €0.068 per kWh all-in // Natural cooling // Sustainable energy source

Bitcoin mining made simple
WITH THE LAST MINE STANDING

We run Bitcoin miners for beginners and professionals using cheap, clean, Siberian hydropower.

See our units in action

Check out the platform!

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”mining_options” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_row use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”60%” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Buy a Preinstalled Miner” module_class=”featured-image-title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_font_size=”30px” background_image=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/siberia-bitcoin-mine-preinstalled-miner.jpg” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_vertical=”-12px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||0px|”]

Hybrid Mining

Pick a miner already installed in Siberia and start mining today
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Table – List” module_class=”featured-image-table-column” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_margin=”0px|||”]

  • No middlemen – mining revenues sent  directly to your wallet
  • All-inclusive hosting fee from 0.101€ / kWh
  • Control your mining operation through the advanced dashboard or directly on the mining pool
  • All repairs and downtimes are covered by Automatic Hot Swap.
    We have achieved historical average of 95%
  • Marketplace to sell your unit whenever you want, or buy profitably from other users

Check out the platform:
my.cyberianmine.de

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”50px||50px|” module_class=”centered-content” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Divider Blue Line” module_class=”separator-line” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ saved_tabs=”all”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.0.48″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Heading – What is Cyberian Mine?” module_class=”headings” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ max_width=”27%” module_alignment=”center” saved_tabs=”all”]

What is Cyberian Mine?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”We’re mining for you, in Siberia” module_class=”medium” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

We’re mining for you, in Siberia

Cyberian Mine GmbH is a German-Russian joint venture cryptocurrency mining company. We grant access to Siberia’s extremely profitable mining conditions from within a secure European business environment.

We offer a distinct competitive advantage thanks to one the lowest electricity price in the world generated by green hydro-power stations, with free natural cooling in Siberia’s low ambient temperature.

Marrying that with the region’s rock bottom operational costs, we offer an unbeatable profitability level for European mining.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/cyberian-mining-hosting-1-1.jpg” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ animation_direction=”left”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/cyberian-bitcoin-mining-hosting-facilities-1-1.jpg” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ animation_direction=”left”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/cyberian-crypto-mining-facilities-1-1.jpg” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ animation_direction=”left”] 
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/cyberian-mining-natural-cooling-system-1-1.jpg” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ animation_direction=”left”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”quote-block” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Who are we?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote content” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]These aren’t existential questions, we just think you probably want to meet our team. See who created Cyberian Mine, here.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”50px||50px|” module_class=”centered-content” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Divider Blue Line” module_class=”separator-line” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ saved_tabs=”all”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.0.48″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Heading – Why Siberia?” module_class=”headings” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ header_2_font=”||||||||” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ max_width=”17.2%” module_alignment=”center” animation_direction=”top” saved_tabs=”all”]

Why Siberia?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”centered-content” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”A unique combination of factors makes Siberia a great place for mining.” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_orientation=”center”]

A unique combination of factors makes Siberia a great place for mining. The Economist agrees.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”numbered-columns first-row” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Electricity Price” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Electricity Price

The world’s lowest electricity costs offer an extreme advantage and exceptional ROI. As mining difficulty grows our clients will continue to generate profits, while others will have to quit mining or buy new gear.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”A Green Future” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

A Green Future

Access to the largest soviet-built hydroelectric plants provides renewable energy with enormous GigaWatt-capacities available for future scaling. More than 12GW in the Irkutsk region alone.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Free Natural Cooling” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Free Natural Cooling

Year-round low temperatures of Siberia mean no need for air conditioning or expensive cooling solutions. Optimal mining equipment conditions at lowest cost.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”numbered-columns second-row” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Low Operational Costs” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Low Operational Costs

Local lease costs allow for perfect mining conditions, with ample space for routine maintenance. The operational and facility support costs are 5-10 times lower than in Europe.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Logistics” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Logistics

Our proximity to suppliers makes Irkutsk a logistically perfect spot for delivery, and support, from the major equipment producers in China. This lets us drastically minimize downtime.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Crypto-business Environment” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Crypto-business Environment

Highly developed blockchain community due to the support of local legal authorities and access to a thriving crypto HR market.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”50px||50px||false|false” module_class=”centered-content” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Divider Blue Line” module_class=”separator-line” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ saved_tabs=”all”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Heading – Why Siberia?” module_class=”headings” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ header_2_font=”||||||||” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ max_width=”25%” module_alignment=”center” animation_direction=”top” saved_tabs=”all”]

Safe and transparent

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Fully compliant legal framework

developed with the help of one of the big four consulting companies. German legal entity Cyberian Mine GmbH and fully owned Russian subsidiary company Cyberian Mine Rus LLC, owning and legally operating the mining equipment in Siberia.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

History

Cyberian Mine is well known in the public space since its start in 2018. During this time our clients reached over 6000 of miners and almost 5MW of total power. Check out our history in our Blog, on Medium or Social media.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Not a cloud mining

From the foundation we are committed to full openness and clarity. Behind each miner on the platform there is a physical device with a serial number. No shady cloud models, only real equipment and auditable transparency.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

What if your miner fails?

We cover all repair expenses and provide automatic backup reserve for the downtime. We have achieved historical average of 96% of specific miner model’s nominal Hash Rate.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Full control

You have direct access to real time hashrate stats and payouts on the mining pool, you can pause or switch off your miner anytime.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Marketplace – easy exit anytime

At any given moment you can sell your dedicated miner contract to another user on the platform through the internal automated Marketplace.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Divider Blue Line” module_class=”separator-line” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ saved_tabs=”all”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_end=”#35a0ff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_cta title=”Welcome-bonus 25€” button_text=”Click Here” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ use_background_color=”off”]Check out our features and available miners for yourself right on the platform.
Look into the marketplace for other users’ offers. Check out pre-orders for next batches.
Test it all with a smallest unit – 10% piece of a shared S19Pro.

Sign up now. No strings attached.
[/et_pb_cta][et_pb_button button_url=”https://my.cyberianmine.de/users/sign_up” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Sign Up and get 25€ for hosting!” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ background_layout=”dark” animation_direction=”top”] 
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Divider Blue Line” module_class=”separator-line” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ saved_tabs=”all”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”quote-block” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ custom_margin=”|||20px”]

Get in touch

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote content” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]We understand that cryptomining includes a lot of variables. That’s why we try to be as helpful and transparent as possible. Use any of the methods below to reach out to us.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
